name: SaffronSam
0:
”Alexa, ask Saffron Sam how to season chicken”
”Alexa, tell Saffron Sam I'm making beef”
”Alexa, ask Saffron Sam what goes good with vegetables”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: saffron sam
des: Saffron Sam is a tool for hands-free, recipe-free cooking. Simply tell her what you're cooking, and she'll give you a list of recommended herbs for that dish. Currently beef, chicken, fish, turkey, lamb, potatoes, pork, and vegetables are supported, and more will be added over time.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
